name: font-leach
description: Minify fonts by scanning source code.

scripts.test-alphanumeric: bin/cli.js test/WenQuanYi\ Zen\ Hei\ Mono.ttf test/output/alphanumeric.ttf
scripts.test-cjk: bin/cli.js test/WenQuanYi\ Zen\ Hei\ Mono.ttf test/output/cjk.ttf --src test/example-src
scripts.test: yarn test-alphanumeric && yarn test-cjk && echo && echo 'Font size report:' && du -sh test/output/*.ttf
